mainBoard.name: Rayne, Academy Chancellor
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever you or a permanent you control is the target of a spell or ability controlled by one of your opponents, you may draw a card, and if Rayne, Academy Chancellor is enchanted, you may draw another card.

rulings.text: If a spell or ability targets multiple permanents you control or targets you and one or more of your permanents, this triggers once for each such target.
The "if" in the card text does not have a special meaning. You check if this card is enchanted when the ability resolves and draw 1 or 2 cards.
When casting an Aura on this card, the triggered ability will resolve before the Aura enters.

mainBoard.text: Whenever you or a permanent you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card. You may draw an additional card if Rayne, Academy Chancellor is enchanted.

mainBoard.flavorText: Rayne once made several unkind comparisons between the bird's naked opportunism and Urza's.

mainBoard.name: Time Spiral
mainBoard.originalText: Remove Time Spiral from the game. Each player shuffles his or her graveyard and hand into his or her library, then draws seven cards. You untap up to six lands.

rulings.text: You choose which lands to untap as the spell resolves. They aren't targeted, and they don't have to be lands that you control.

foreignData.name: Eid der Lehensleute
foreignData.text: Wenn während der Versorgungsphase eines Spielers dieser Spieler weniger Länder als ein Gegner seiner Wahl kontrolliert, kann der Spieler seine Bibliothek nach einer Standardlandkarte durchsuchen und diese direkt ins Spiel bringen. Dieser Spieler mischt danach seine Bibliothek neu.

sideBoard.name: Oath of Lieges
sideBoard.originalText: During each player's upkeep, if that player controls fewer lands than target opponent, the player may search his or her library for a basic land card and put that land into play. The player shuffles his or her library afterwards.

rulings.text: Because the "search" requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don't have to find the card if you don't want to.
The land card enters under the current player's control.
Shuffling the library is part of the optional effect. The player only shuffles if they chose to search.
The ability can only target an opponent of the current player.

The targeted player controlling more lands than the current player is a part of the targeting requirement. A player can't be targeted by this ability unless it's true, and the ability doesn't resolve if it's no longer true at that time.

sideBoard.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player who controls more lands than they do and is their opponent. The first player may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

sideBoard.flavorText:
"That which knows itself cannot be shaped to another's will."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

foreignData.name: Gesegneter Boden

sideBoard.name: Sacred Ground
sideBoard.originalText: Whenever an effect controlled by any opponent puts a land into your graveyard from play, put that land into play.
sideBoard.text: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes a land to be put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to the battlefield.
